Uses of Package
view

  • Packages that use view 
    Package Description
    presenter  
    view  
    view.maze  
    view.slidePuzzle  
  • Classes in view used by presenter 
    Class and Description
    View
    View Interface - extends Task
    defines the following functions:
    start() - enable to use non runnable classes as if they were
    displaySolution - Gets a solution and shows it
    getUserAction - returns the action that was input by the user
    printErr - gets a String and prints it
  • Classes in view used by view 
    Class and Description
    BasicWindow
    BasicWindow Class extends Observable and implements Runnable.
    MenuBar
    MenuBar Class defines the common menu that will serve every window that will desires it.
    Point
    Point Class - simple class that contains 2 x,y ints which represent position of a point.
